segments.text: Hello , this is Li Bo speaking .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hi , I am Liu Ming . I am calling to tell you that I have got the job .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I really feel grateful to you for your reference . They have mentioned this in the job interview .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't mention it . I think that is because you have right qualifications and nice personality .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks again . I will start on next Monday . I am sure I will have good performance .
segments.speaker: S2
